citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1130 on
11-Jul-19.
Upon arrival at the facility contact was made with a facility representative. She stated that the licensee was not
home and would be away all day.
End of report.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

11-Jul-19.
Upon arrival at the facility contact was made with a facility representative.  She stated that the licensee was not
home and would be away all day.  
End of report.
